text: Ba bandi (abamalayika) bateruye Ar’shi n’abayikikije, basingiza ikuzo rya Nyagasani wabo bakanamwemera, bakanasabira imbabazi ba bandi bemera (bagira bati) “Nyagasani wacu! Impuhwe n’ubumenyi byawe bigera kuri buri kintu. None babarira ibyaha ba bandi bakwicujijeho, bakanakurikira inzira yawe ndetse unabarinde ibihano byo mu muriro.”
